Photon.Pun.PunExtensions Class Reference Photon.Pun.PunExtensions
Small number of extension methods that make it easier for PUN to work cross-Unity-versions.

Detailed Description
Small number of extension methods that make it easier for PUN to work cross-Unity-versions.
